title: Bush corridors
creator_credit: Ron Saunders, Justin Milne, South Australian Film Corporation and Newfilms
brief_description: This film will be of interest to the general public but it is designed primarily for farmers to convince them of the necessity of leaving areas of scrub uncleared. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
creator_credit_for_label: Ron Saunders, Justin Milne, South Australian Film Corporation and Newfilms
